name: Spades (itch)
description:
STILL JUST A STRESS TEST FOR LOTS OF PARTICLES

Ever had the need for every bullet in a game to hit each other and spin off at a tangent? (neither have I) well now they can!

Features:

- Fast Space Action

- Lots and lots of Particles

(! - WARNING - !)

if you suffer from epilepsy or seizures you might want to give this one a miss.

also; you kinda need a reasonably powerful computer for it to run.
